resources.string: Application cannot work without these permissions!
Application cannot work without these permissions!
To continue, you need to go to the settings and enable FINE and COARSE GPS location.
You are supposed to allow using fine GPS location. We use your location to show it on the map.
Welcome to Map Excursions - the app where you can find any sight of your city or countryside.\n\nLet\'s talk about how to use it!
You can choose a map with the sights you are interested in. There are two map types: nature and history maps.\n\nYou can see these icons on the map:
Click on a sight marker to get some more information about the place: its history, photos etc.
